clickablePerkPromos.title: Choose 3 months of Disney+ Standard, Amazon Prime, or more.

termsAndConditions.title: Choose 3 months of Disney+ Standard, Amazon Prime, or more.
termsAndConditions.content:
With this tariff, you can choose 3 months of Disney+, Amazon Prime, Amazon Music Unlimited, Audible, McAfee and others on us. Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Once your free period is up, you'll automatically move to the paid service. You can opt out of this at any time in My O2.

Extra: Get 3 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 3 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities. Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim and full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

International Bolt On Extra is direct with O2 and will apply for 36 months or until you leave, cancel or upgrade. You will be charged £1/month or not at all for International Bolt On Extra depending on the Eligible Tariff you select. Terms and additional charges apply to the International Bolt On Extra. Tariff eligibility criteria may apply which includes, but is not limited to, being a UK resident and being over 18.

Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. We’ll send you a text and an email with a link to activate. Or go to My O2 to redeem. For full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

voltBenefitsPromos.title: Get double data (10GB), boosted broadband speeds and more, when you’re with both Virgin Media and O2.
voltBenefitsPromos.cmsDescription:
Max out the benefits when you have Virgin Media broadband and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household, including:​
 

  • Double data for every eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household

  • Roam freely in 75 destinations worldwide at no extra cost, with O2 Travel Inclusive Zone (unless you already have this with O2)*

  • Bag a Virgin Media broadband speed boost to the next available level (up to 1Gbps)

  • Kick back with a WiFi guarantee at no extra cost (if you don’t have it already) – meaning reliable WiFi in every room or money back and up to three WiFi Pods if needed, on us


Because life's yours for grabbing, when you're with us both.​
 

Find out more​

*Tablets excluded from roaming benefit​
 

Applying your Volt benefits​
 

You'll need an eligible Virgin Media broadband pack or bundle and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone, tablet or SIM in your household to get Volt benefits.
​

If the name on your Virgin Media broadband account matches the name on your O2 mobile account, your Volt benefits will be added automatically within 14 days. If they don't match, or the accounts in the household are in different names, you can edit your address and activate your Volt benefits in My O2 and My Virgin Media. Learn how to do that here.​
​

The monthly data allowance for your eligible O2 plan will be doubled for all tariffs up to 250GB. For all tariffs of 250GB and over, we will increase your data allowance to unlimited. Double data will not rollover. If your eligible O2 plan already includes unlimited data you will not receive an increased data allowance as part of this offer.
​

O2 Travel Inclusive Zone included for each eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone and SIM in the Virgin Media account holder's name and address. Includes unlimited minutes, texts and data roaming in 75 selected destinations only (our Travel Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Excludes mobile broadband, smart watches and tablets.
​

Separate contracts and terms and conditions apply to your broadband and mobile services.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

promos.title: Swap to a new phone every 90 days, with O2 Switch Up.
promos.cmsDescription:
O2 Switch Up is included with Plus Plans and Ultimate Plans at no extra cost, or you can add it to a Classic Plan as a Bolt On for £6.99 a month.

 

With O2 Switch Up, you can swap your current phone for a new one every 90 days. It cannot be used within the first 90 days from purchase.

 

You’ll start a new plan for whichever phone you’ve picked and once we’ve checked your old phone is in good nick, we’ll pay off your existing contract.

 

Your old phone will then be refurbished and given a new home as one of our Like New phones.

 

If your phone doesn’t meet our grading criteria, we’ll let you know what other options are available.

 

For full terms, see: https://www.o2.co.uk/termsandconditions/mobile/o2-switch-up.

promos.title: Roam at no extra cost in 75 destinations, USA included.
promos.cmsDescription:
Excludes 30-day sim only and mobile broadband tariffs. Roaming destinations include our Europe Zone plus O2 Travel Inclusive in 27 international destinations. Data speed capped at 2 mbps. See https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone.

 

Use your call, text and data allowances when roaming in our Europe Zone, subject to O2’s fair usage policy. For information on our Europe Zone and out of bundle charges, see https://www.o2.co.uk/help/pay-monthly/roaming-in-europe.

 

O2 Travel Inclusive offer only available on eligible tariffs and includes unlimited minutes and texts and data roaming (with capped data speeds of 2 mbps) in 27 selected destinations only (our Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Terms apply, see o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: Get peace of mind with 3-Year Warranty.
promos.cmsDescription: Selected tariffs only. 3 Year Warranty is lost if you move to an ineligible tariff, upgrade and purchase a new device or SIM only plan or fail to pay monthly payments. 3 Year period includes any standard manufacturer warranty period. Exclusions apply. Wear and tear, software issues and accidental, cosmetic or water damage are not covered. For full exclusions and terms see o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

promos.cmsDescription: Covers 1 device for 1 year. Requires iOS operating system 15.0 or later; Apple Watch app available with iPhone 5 and later or Android operating system 9.0 or later; Android Watch features supported with OS 9.0 or later.

clickablePerkPromos.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.

termsAndConditions.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.
termsAndConditions.content:
Extra: Get an Extra included for the lifetime of your plan when taking one of our Ultimate Plans (“Extra Period”). Extra Period will be shorter if you choose to leave your Ultimate Plan earlier. You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription if you leave your Ultimate Plan, current partner pricing: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm or Disney+ Premium Plan £12.99 (Customers taking Amazon Prime and Disney+ Premium Plan will get a £2 airtime discount that will remain for as long as they retain their paid Extra). Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. If you leave your Ultimate Plan within 6 months of redeeming your Ultimate inclusive Extra, you will need to pay for this Extra at the then-current partner price for the remainder of the initial 6 month period that applies. After that period expires, you will be able to cancel this Extra.


Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select your Extra at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use.


Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities.


Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim & full terms, see O2 Extras | Terms and Conditions | O2.

With this tariff, you can choose 3 months of Disney+, Amazon Prime, Amazon Music Unlimited, Audible, McAfee and others on us. Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Once your free period is up, you'll automatically move to the paid service. You can opt out of this at any time in My O2.

Extra: Get 3 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 3 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities. Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim and full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

International Bolt On Extra is direct with O2 and will apply for 36 months or until you leave, cancel or upgrade. You will be charged £1/month or not at all for International Bolt On Extra depending on the Eligible Tariff you select. Terms and additional charges apply to the International Bolt On Extra. Tariff eligibility criteria may apply which includes, but is not limited to, being a UK resident and being over 18.

Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. We’ll send you a text and an email with a link to activate. Or go to My O2 to redeem. For full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

voltBenefitsPromos.title: Get double data (50GB), boosted broadband speeds and more, when you’re with both Virgin Media and O2.
voltBenefitsPromos.cmsDescription:
Max out the benefits when you have Virgin Media broadband and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household, including:​
 

  • Double data for every eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household

  • Roam freely in 75 destinations worldwide at no extra cost, with O2 Travel Inclusive Zone (unless you already have this with O2)*

  • Bag a Virgin Media broadband speed boost to the next available level (up to 1Gbps)

  • Kick back with a WiFi guarantee at no extra cost (if you don’t have it already) – meaning reliable WiFi in every room or money back and up to three WiFi Pods if needed, on us


Because life's yours for grabbing, when you're with us both.​
 

Find out more​

*Tablets excluded from roaming benefit​
 

Applying your Volt benefits​
 

You'll need an eligible Virgin Media broadband pack or bundle and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone, tablet or SIM in your household to get Volt benefits.
​

If the name on your Virgin Media broadband account matches the name on your O2 mobile account, your Volt benefits will be added automatically within 14 days. If they don't match, or the accounts in the household are in different names, you can edit your address and activate your Volt benefits in My O2 and My Virgin Media. Learn how to do that here.​
​

The monthly data allowance for your eligible O2 plan will be doubled for all tariffs up to 250GB. For all tariffs of 250GB and over, we will increase your data allowance to unlimited. Double data will not rollover. If your eligible O2 plan already includes unlimited data you will not receive an increased data allowance as part of this offer.
​

O2 Travel Inclusive Zone included for each eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone and SIM in the Virgin Media account holder's name and address. Includes unlimited minutes, texts and data roaming in 75 selected destinations only (our Travel Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Excludes mobile broadband, smart watches and tablets.
​

Separate contracts and terms and conditions apply to your broadband and mobile services.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

promos.title: Swap to a new phone every 90 days, with O2 Switch Up.
promos.cmsDescription:
O2 Switch Up is included with Plus Plans and Ultimate Plans at no extra cost, or you can add it to a Classic Plan as a Bolt On for £6.99 a month.

 

With O2 Switch Up, you can swap your current phone for a new one every 90 days. It cannot be used within the first 90 days from purchase.

 

You’ll start a new plan for whichever phone you’ve picked and once we’ve checked your old phone is in good nick, we’ll pay off your existing contract.

 

Your old phone will then be refurbished and given a new home as one of our Like New phones.

 

If your phone doesn’t meet our grading criteria, we’ll let you know what other options are available.

 

For full terms, see: https://www.o2.co.uk/termsandconditions/mobile/o2-switch-up.

promos.title: Roam at no extra cost in 75 destinations, USA included.
promos.cmsDescription:
Excludes 30-day sim only and mobile broadband tariffs. Roaming destinations include our Europe Zone plus O2 Travel Inclusive in 27 international destinations. Data speed capped at 2 mbps. See https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone.

 

Use your call, text and data allowances when roaming in our Europe Zone, subject to O2’s fair usage policy. For information on our Europe Zone and out of bundle charges, see https://www.o2.co.uk/help/pay-monthly/roaming-in-europe.

 

O2 Travel Inclusive offer only available on eligible tariffs and includes unlimited minutes and texts and data roaming (with capped data speeds of 2 mbps) in 27 selected destinations only (our Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Terms apply, see o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: Get peace of mind with 3-Year Warranty.
promos.cmsDescription: Selected tariffs only. 3 Year Warranty is lost if you move to an ineligible tariff, upgrade and purchase a new device or SIM only plan or fail to pay monthly payments. 3 Year period includes any standard manufacturer warranty period. Exclusions apply. Wear and tear, software issues and accidental, cosmetic or water damage are not covered. For full exclusions and terms see o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

promos.cmsDescription: Covers 1 device for 1 year. Requires iOS operating system 15.0 or later; Apple Watch app available with iPhone 5 and later or Android operating system 9.0 or later; Android Watch features supported with OS 9.0 or later.

clickablePerkPromos.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.

termsAndConditions.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.
termsAndConditions.content:
Extra: Get an Extra included for the lifetime of your plan when taking one of our Ultimate Plans (“Extra Period”). Extra Period will be shorter if you choose to leave your Ultimate Plan earlier. You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription if you leave your Ultimate Plan, current partner pricing: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm or Disney+ Premium Plan £12.99 (Customers taking Amazon Prime and Disney+ Premium Plan will get a £2 airtime discount that will remain for as long as they retain their paid Extra). Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. If you leave your Ultimate Plan within 6 months of redeeming your Ultimate inclusive Extra, you will need to pay for this Extra at the then-current partner price for the remainder of the initial 6 month period that applies. After that period expires, you will be able to cancel this Extra.


Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select your Extra at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use.


Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities.


Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim & full terms, see O2 Extras | Terms and Conditions | O2.

promos.title: Lowest ever monthly cost. Ends 4 June.
promos.cmsDescription:
Data allowances must be used within the month and cannot be carried over. Ends 04 June 2025.

 

O2 Refresh custom plans: Direct purchases only. Pay the cash price for your device or spread the cost over 3 to 36 months (excludes dongles). The device cost will be the same whatever you choose. There may be an upfront cost. You can pay off your Device Plan at any time and choose to keep your Airtime Plan, upgrade it, or leave. If you are in the first 24 months of your Device Plan and you cancel your Airtime Plan you will have to pay the remainder of your Device Plan in full. After 24 months you can keep your Airtime Plan, upgrade it, or end it without affecting your Device Plan.

 

UK data only. Fair Usage policy applies. Devices are subject to availability. 0% APR. Finance subject to status and credit checks. 18+. Direct Debit. Credit provided by Telefonica UK Ltd, 500 Brook Drive, Reading, RG2 6UU, UK. Telefonica UK is authorised and regulated by the FCA for consumer credit and insurance. Terms apply, o2.co.uk/terms.

Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Once your free period is up, you'll automatically move to the paid service. You can opt out of this at any time in My O2.

Extra: Get 3 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 3 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities. Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim and full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

International Bolt On Extra is direct with O2 and will apply for 36 months or until you leave, cancel or upgrade. You will be charged £1/month or not at all for International Bolt On Extra depending on the Eligible Tariff you select. Terms and additional charges apply to the International Bolt On Extra. Tariff eligibility criteria may apply which includes, but is not limited to, being a UK resident and being over 18.

Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. We’ll send you a text and an email with a link to activate. Or go to My O2 to redeem. For full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

voltBenefitsPromos.title: Get double data (250GB), boosted broadband speeds and more, when you’re with both Virgin Media and O2.
voltBenefitsPromos.cmsDescription:
Max out the benefits when you have Virgin Media broadband and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household, including:​
 

  • Double data for every eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household

  • Roam freely in 75 destinations worldwide at no extra cost, with O2 Travel Inclusive Zone (unless you already have this with O2)*

  • Bag a Virgin Media broadband speed boost to the next available level (up to 1Gbps)

  • Kick back with a WiFi guarantee at no extra cost (if you don’t have it already) – meaning reliable WiFi in every room or money back and up to three WiFi Pods if needed, on us


Because life's yours for grabbing, when you're with us both.​
 

Find out more​

*Tablets excluded from roaming benefit​
 

Applying your Volt benefits​
 

You'll need an eligible Virgin Media broadband pack or bundle and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone, tablet or SIM in your household to get Volt benefits.
​

If the name on your Virgin Media broadband account matches the name on your O2 mobile account, your Volt benefits will be added automatically within 14 days. If they don't match, or the accounts in the household are in different names, you can edit your address and activate your Volt benefits in My O2 and My Virgin Media. Learn how to do that here.​
​

The monthly data allowance for your eligible O2 plan will be doubled for all tariffs up to 250GB. For all tariffs of 250GB and over, we will increase your data allowance to unlimited. Double data will not rollover. If your eligible O2 plan already includes unlimited data you will not receive an increased data allowance as part of this offer.
​

O2 Travel Inclusive Zone included for each eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone and SIM in the Virgin Media account holder's name and address. Includes unlimited minutes, texts and data roaming in 75 selected destinations only (our Travel Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Excludes mobile broadband, smart watches and tablets.
​

Separate contracts and terms and conditions apply to your broadband and mobile services.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

promos.title: Lowest ever monthly cost. Ends 4 June.
promos.cmsDescription:
Data allowances must be used within the month and cannot be carried over. Ends 04 June 2025.

 

O2 Refresh custom plans: Direct purchases only. Pay the cash price for your device or spread the cost over 3 to 36 months (excludes dongles). The device cost will be the same whatever you choose. There may be an upfront cost. You can pay off your Device Plan at any time and choose to keep your Airtime Plan, upgrade it, or leave. If you are in the first 24 months of your Device Plan and you cancel your Airtime Plan you will have to pay the remainder of your Device Plan in full. After 24 months you can keep your Airtime Plan, upgrade it, or end it without affecting your Device Plan.

 

UK data only. Fair Usage policy applies. Devices are subject to availability. 0% APR. Finance subject to status and credit checks. 18+. Direct Debit. Credit provided by Telefonica UK Ltd, 500 Brook Drive, Reading, RG2 6UU, UK. Telefonica UK is authorised and regulated by the FCA for consumer credit and insurance. Terms apply, o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: Swap to a new phone every 90 days, with O2 Switch Up.
promos.cmsDescription:
O2 Switch Up is included with Plus Plans and Ultimate Plans at no extra cost, or you can add it to a Classic Plan as a Bolt On for £6.99 a month.

 

With O2 Switch Up, you can swap your current phone for a new one every 90 days. It cannot be used within the first 90 days from purchase.

 

You’ll start a new plan for whichever phone you’ve picked and once we’ve checked your old phone is in good nick, we’ll pay off your existing contract.

 

Your old phone will then be refurbished and given a new home as one of our Like New phones.

 

If your phone doesn’t meet our grading criteria, we’ll let you know what other options are available.

 

For full terms, see: https://www.o2.co.uk/termsandconditions/mobile/o2-switch-up.

promos.title: Roam at no extra cost in 75 destinations, USA included.
promos.cmsDescription:
Excludes 30-day sim only and mobile broadband tariffs. Roaming destinations include our Europe Zone plus O2 Travel Inclusive in 27 international destinations. Data speed capped at 2 mbps. See https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone.

 

Use your call, text and data allowances when roaming in our Europe Zone, subject to O2’s fair usage policy. For information on our Europe Zone and out of bundle charges, see https://www.o2.co.uk/help/pay-monthly/roaming-in-europe.

 

O2 Travel Inclusive offer only available on eligible tariffs and includes unlimited minutes and texts and data roaming (with capped data speeds of 2 mbps) in 27 selected destinations only (our Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Terms apply, see o2.co.uk/terms.

Exclusions apply. Wear and tear, software issues and accidental, cosmetic or water damage are not covered. For full exclusions and terms see o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

termsAndConditions.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.
termsAndConditions.content:
Extra: Get an Extra included for the lifetime of your plan when taking one of our Ultimate Plans (“Extra Period”). Extra Period will be shorter if you choose to leave your Ultimate Plan earlier. You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription if you leave your Ultimate Plan, current partner pricing: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm or Disney+ Premium Plan £12.99 (Customers taking Amazon Prime and Disney+ Premium Plan will get a £2 airtime discount that will remain for as long as they retain their paid Extra). Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. If you leave your Ultimate Plan within 6 months of redeeming your Ultimate inclusive Extra, you will need to pay for this Extra at the then-current partner price for the remainder of the initial 6 month period that applies. After that period expires, you will be able to cancel this Extra.


Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select your Extra at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use.


Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities.


Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim & full terms, see O2 Extras | Terms and Conditions | O2.

termsAndConditions.content:
With this tariff, you can choose 3 months of Disney+, Amazon Prime, Amazon Music Unlimited, Audible, McAfee and others on us. Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Extra: Get 3 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 3 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. voltBenefitsPromos.title: Get boosted broadband speeds and more when you’re with both Virgin Media and O2.
voltBenefitsPromos.cmsDescription:
Max out the benefits when you have Virgin Media broadband and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household, including:​
 

  • Double data for every eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household

  • Roam freely in 75 destinations worldwide at no extra cost, with O2 Travel Inclusive Zone (unless you already have this with O2)*

  • Bag a Virgin Media broadband speed boost to the next available level (up to 1Gbps)

  • Kick back with a WiFi guarantee at no extra cost (if you don’t have it already) – meaning reliable WiFi in every room or money back and up to three WiFi Pods if needed, on us


Because life's yours for grabbing, when you're with us both.​
 

Find out more​

*Tablets excluded from roaming benefit​
 

Applying your Volt benefits​
 

You'll need an eligible Virgin Media broadband pack or bundle and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone, tablet or SIM in your household to get Volt benefits.
​

If the name on your Virgin Media broadband account matches the name on your O2 mobile account, your Volt benefits will be added automatically within 14 days. If they don't match, or the accounts in the household are in different names, you can edit your address and activate your Volt benefits in My O2 and My Virgin Media. Learn how to do that here.​
​

The monthly data allowance for your eligible O2 plan will be doubled for all tariffs up to 250GB. For all tariffs of 250GB and over, we will increase your data allowance to unlimited. Double data will not rollover. If your eligible O2 plan already includes unlimited data you will not receive an increased data allowance as part of this offer.
​

O2 Travel Inclusive Zone included for each eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone and SIM in the Virgin Media account holder's name and address. Includes unlimited minutes, texts and data roaming in 75 selected destinations only (our Travel Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Excludes mobile broadband, smart watches and tablets.
​

Separate contracts and terms and conditions apply to your broadband and mobile services.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

promos.title: Swap to a new phone every 90 days, with O2 Switch Up.
promos.cmsDescription:
O2 Switch Up is included with Plus Plans and Ultimate Plans at no extra cost, or you can add it to a Classic Plan as a Bolt On for £6.99 a month.

 

With O2 Switch Up, you can swap your current phone for a new one every 90 days. It cannot be used within the first 90 days from purchase.

 

You’ll start a new plan for whichever phone you’ve picked and once we’ve checked your old phone is in good nick, we’ll pay off your existing contract.

 

Your old phone will then be refurbished and given a new home as one of our Like New phones.

 

If your phone doesn’t meet our grading criteria, we’ll let you know what other options are available.

 

For full terms, see: https://www.o2.co.uk/termsandconditions/mobile/o2-switch-up.

promos.title: Roam at no extra cost in 75 destinations, USA included.
promos.cmsDescription:
Excludes 30-day sim only and mobile broadband tariffs. Roaming destinations include our Europe Zone plus O2 Travel Inclusive in 27 international destinations. Data speed capped at 2 mbps. See https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone.

 

Use your call, text and data allowances when roaming in our Europe Zone, subject to O2’s fair usage policy. For information on our Europe Zone and out of bundle charges, see https://www.o2.co.uk/help/pay-monthly/roaming-in-europe.

 

O2 Travel Inclusive offer only available on eligible tariffs and includes unlimited minutes and texts and data roaming (with capped data speeds of 2 mbps) in 27 selected destinations only (our Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Terms apply, see o2.co.uk/terms.

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

termsAndConditions.title: Choose 3 months of Disney+ Standard, Amazon Prime, or more.
termsAndConditions.content:
With this tariff, you can choose 3 months of Disney+, Amazon Prime, Amazon Music Unlimited, Audible, McAfee and others on us. Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Once your free period is up, you'll automatically move to the paid service. You can opt out of this at any time in My O2.

Extra: Get 3 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 3 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities. Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim and full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

International Bolt On Extra is direct with O2 and will apply for 36 months or until you leave, cancel or upgrade. You will be charged £1/month or not at all for International Bolt On Extra depending on the Eligible Tariff you select. Terms and additional charges apply to the International Bolt On Extra. Tariff eligibility criteria may apply which includes, but is not limited to, being a UK resident and being over 18.

Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. We’ll send you a text and an email with a link to activate. Or go to My O2 to redeem. For full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

voltBenefitsPromos.title: Get double data (10GB), boosted broadband speeds and more, when you’re with both Virgin Media and O2.
voltBenefitsPromos.cmsDescription:
Max out the benefits when you have Virgin Media broadband and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household, including:​
 

  • Double data for every eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household

  • Roam freely in 75 destinations worldwide at no extra cost, with O2 Travel Inclusive Zone (unless you already have this with O2)*

  • Bag a Virgin Media broadband speed boost to the next available level (up to 1Gbps)

  • Kick back with a WiFi guarantee at no extra cost (if you don’t have it already) – meaning reliable WiFi in every room or money back and up to three WiFi Pods if needed, on us


Because life's yours for grabbing, when you're with us both.​
 

Find out more​

*Tablets excluded from roaming benefit​
 

Applying your Volt benefits​
 

You'll need an eligible Virgin Media broadband pack or bundle and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone, tablet or SIM in your household to get Volt benefits.
​

If the name on your Virgin Media broadband account matches the name on your O2 mobile account, your Volt benefits will be added automatically within 14 days. If they don't match, or the accounts in the household are in different names, you can edit your address and activate your Volt benefits in My O2 and My Virgin Media. Learn how to do that here.​
​

The monthly data allowance for your eligible O2 plan will be doubled for all tariffs up to 250GB. For all tariffs of 250GB and over, we will increase your data allowance to unlimited. Double data will not rollover. If your eligible O2 plan already includes unlimited data you will not receive an increased data allowance as part of this offer.
​

O2 Travel Inclusive Zone included for each eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone and SIM in the Virgin Media account holder's name and address. Includes unlimited minutes, texts and data roaming in 75 selected destinations only (our Travel Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Excludes mobile broadband, smart watches and tablets.
​

Separate contracts and terms and conditions apply to your broadband and mobile services.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

Terms apply, see https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone-ultimate.

termsAndConditions.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.
termsAndConditions.content:
Extra: Get an Extra included for the lifetime of your plan when taking one of our Ultimate Plans (“Extra Period”). Extra Period will be shorter if you choose to leave your Ultimate Plan earlier. You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription if you leave your Ultimate Plan, current partner pricing: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm or Disney+ Premium Plan £12.99 (Customers taking Amazon Prime and Disney+ Premium Plan will get a £2 airtime discount that will remain for as long as they retain their paid Extra). Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. If you leave your Ultimate Plan within 6 months of redeeming your Ultimate inclusive Extra, you will need to pay for this Extra at the then-current partner price for the remainder of the initial 6 month period that applies. After that period expires, you will be able to cancel this Extra.


Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select your Extra at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use.


Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities.


Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim & full terms, see O2 Extras | Terms and Conditions | O2.

voltBenefitsPromos.title: Get double data (50GB), boosted broadband speeds and more, when you’re with both Virgin Media and O2.
voltBenefitsPromos.cmsDescription:
Max out the benefits when you have Virgin Media broadband and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household, including:​
 

  • Double data for every eligible O2 Pay Monthly plan in your household

  • Roam freely in 75 destinations worldwide at no extra cost, with O2 Travel Inclusive Zone (unless you already have this with O2)*

  • Bag a Virgin Media broadband speed boost to the next available level (up to 1Gbps)

  • Kick back with a WiFi guarantee at no extra cost (if you don’t have it already) – meaning reliable WiFi in every room or money back and up to three WiFi Pods if needed, on us


Because life's yours for grabbing, when you're with us both.​
 

Find out more​

*Tablets excluded from roaming benefit​
 

Applying your Volt benefits​
 

You'll need an eligible Virgin Media broadband pack or bundle and an eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone, tablet or SIM in your household to get Volt benefits.
​

If the name on your Virgin Media broadband account matches the name on your O2 mobile account, your Volt benefits will be added automatically within 14 days. If they don't match, or the accounts in the household are in different names, you can edit your address and activate your Volt benefits in My O2 and My Virgin Media. Learn how to do that here.​
​

The monthly data allowance for your eligible O2 plan will be doubled for all tariffs up to 250GB. For all tariffs of 250GB and over, we will increase your data allowance to unlimited. Double data will not rollover. If your eligible O2 plan already includes unlimited data you will not receive an increased data allowance as part of this offer.
​

O2 Travel Inclusive Zone included for each eligible O2 Pay Monthly phone and SIM in the Virgin Media account holder's name and address. Includes unlimited minutes, texts and data roaming in 75 selected destinations only (our Travel Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only. No upper use limit on data but traffic management steps will apply. Excludes mobile broadband, smart watches and tablets.
​

Separate contracts and terms and conditions apply to your broadband and mobile services.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

termsAndConditions.title: Choose 6 months of Disney+ Standard, Amazon Prime, or more.
termsAndConditions.content:
With this tariff, you can choose 6 months of Disney+, Amazon Prime, Amazon Music Unlimited, Audible, McAfee and others on us. Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Once your free period is up, you'll automatically move to the paid service. You can opt out of this at any time in My O2.

Extra: Get 6 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. You will not be eligible to select Amazon Prime if you made a qualifying purchase via a Virgin Media sales channel and/or your Eligible Tariff is part of a bundle or service with Virgin Media. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 6 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities. Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim and full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

Subject to fair usage at no extra charge. Non-commercial use only.


Terms apply, see https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone-ultimate.

promos.cmsDescription: Covers 1 device for 1 year. Requires iOS operating system 15.0 or later; Apple Watch app available with iPhone 5 and later or Android operating system 9.0 or later; Android Watch features supported with OS 9.0 or later.

clickablePerkPromos.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.

termsAndConditions.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.
termsAndConditions.content:
Extra: Get an Extra included for the lifetime of your plan when taking one of our Ultimate Plans (“Extra Period”). Extra Period will be shorter if you choose to leave your Ultimate Plan earlier. You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription if you leave your Ultimate Plan, current partner pricing: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm or Disney+ Premium Plan £12.99 (Customers taking Amazon Prime and Disney+ Premium Plan will get a £2 airtime discount that will remain for as long as they retain their paid Extra). Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. If you leave your Ultimate Plan within 6 months of redeeming your Ultimate inclusive Extra, you will need to pay for this Extra at the then-current partner price for the remainder of the initial 6 month period that applies. After that period expires, you will be able to cancel this Extra.


Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select your Extra at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use.


Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities.


Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim & full terms, see O2 Extras | Terms and Conditions | O2.

promos.cmsDescription:
Data allowances must be used within the month and cannot be carried over. Ends 04 June 2025.

 

O2 Refresh custom plans: Direct purchases only. Pay the cash price for your device or spread the cost over 3 to 36 months (excludes dongles). The device cost will be the same whatever you choose. There may be an upfront cost. You can pay off your Device Plan at any time and choose to keep your Airtime Plan, upgrade it, or leave. After 24 months you can keep your Airtime Plan, upgrade it, or end it without affecting your Device Plan.

 

UK data only. Fair Usage policy applies. Devices are subject to availability. 0% APR. Finance subject to status and credit checks. 18+. Direct Debit. Credit provided by Telefonica UK Ltd, 500 Brook Drive, Reading, RG2 6UU, UK. Telefonica UK is authorised and regulated by the FCA for consumer credit and insurance. Terms apply, o2.co.uk/terms.

content.title: Tariff information
content.contentData:
Out of bundle charges will increase each year from 5% from 1st April. See our extra charges guide for a full list of what you’ll pay for calls, texts and data outside your bundle.

  1. Voice calls Applies to calls made in in the UK and when roaming in our Europe Zone to standard landlines and mobiles. Minute minimum charges apply.
  2. Text message Tariffs include unlimited texts. Text messages are charged at 40p per message thereafter. Note: iPad does not support SMS functionality.
  3. Voicemail Calls to your voicemail are included in your bundled minutes, then 20p per minute thereafter. Except on the unlimited minute tariffs when voicemail is free.
  4. Browsing UK and Europe Zone data usage only. Data used while outside of our Europe Zone is not included. Applies if a data bundle Bolt On is not chosen.
  5. Calls to customer services Calls from a non-O2 mobile phone are charged at your providers' rates.
  6. O2 Directory Enquiries Calls to 118402 only. For calls to other 118 numbers see http://www.o2.co.uk/help/everything-else/special-numbers

5G network

Experience faster connectivity in even the busiest areas - with our nationwide 5G network.

All our pay monthly plans include 5G, and all you need is 5G-ready device. If you have an O2 sim card, it supports both 4G and 5G networks. Use our coverage checker to see if 5G is available in your area.

Read full 5G terms and conditions

termsAndConditions.title: Choose 6 months of Disney+ Standard, Amazon Prime, or more.
termsAndConditions.content:
With this tariff, you can choose 6 months of Disney+, Amazon Prime, Amazon Music Unlimited, Audible, McAfee and others on us. Pick your O2 Extra when you place your order, or choose in My O2 within 28 days. Remember to redeem (via link in My O2) within 28 days. Once your free period is up, you'll automatically move to the paid service. You can opt out of this at any time in My O2.

Extra: Get 6 months on us depending on eligible tariff you select (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription after Extra Period: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Amazon Music Unlimited £10.99pm, Audible £7.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm, McAfee £4.99pm, Disney+ - Standard Plan with Ads £4.99pm, Standard Plan £8.99pm or Premium Plan £12.99pm. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. You will not be eligible to select Amazon Prime if you made a qualifying purchase via a Virgin Media sales channel and/or your Eligible Tariff is part of a bundle or service with Virgin Media. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Extra within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use. Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period.

Disney+ Standard Plan: Get 6 months on us (“Extra Period”). You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription of £8.99pm after Extra Period. Opt out at any time. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ within 28 days of making qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities. Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim and full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

International Bolt On Extra is direct with O2 and will apply for 36 months or until you leave, cancel or upgrade. You will be charged £1/month or not at all for International Bolt On Extra depending on the Eligible Tariff you select. Terms and additional charges apply to the International Bolt On Extra. Tariff eligibility criteria may apply which includes, but is not limited to, being a UK resident and being over 18.

Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. We’ll send you a text and an email with a link to activate. Or go to My O2 to redeem. For full terms: o2.co.uk/terms/extras

promos.title: O2 Insure Ultimate Cover. Includes unlimited claims, a 3-year warranty and more.
promos.cmsDescription:
Covers repair or replacement of your phone and includes damage (except cosmetic damage), theft (unless left unattended without proof of protection), accidental loss, breakdown (within 3 years of purchase date from O2), accessories purchased from O2 (up to £300) that are accidentally lost, stolen, or damaged at the same time as your phone or device, plus Worldwide cover.

 

Same day delivery, excluding weekends and public holidays, Northern Ireland, certain postcodes in Scotland, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles. Successful claims must be made by 12 noon UK time. Make a claim online at https://www.o2.co.uk/insurance-claim. Repair or Replacement delivery available to a UK address only (Monday to Friday inclusive, exceptions & exclusions apply). Claims for loss and theft will be settled from refurbished or remanufactured stock.

 

You can cancel at any time via MyO2. See https://www.o2.co.uk/help/digital-services/o2-insurance for more details.

 

Status disclosure: Telefonica UK Ltd is a Lender and Insurance Intermediary, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Insurance underwritten by Telefonica Insurance UK Branch, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

termsAndConditions.title: Pick an Extra, included for the lifetime of your Ultimate Plan.
termsAndConditions.content:
Extra: Get an Extra included for the lifetime of your plan when taking one of our Ultimate Plans (“Extra Period”). Extra Period will be shorter if you choose to leave your Ultimate Plan earlier. You’ll be automatically opted in to a paid monthly subscription if you leave your Ultimate Plan, current partner pricing: Amazon Prime £8.99pm, Cafeyn £7.99pm or Disney+ Premium Plan £12.99 (Customers taking Amazon Prime and Disney+ Premium Plan will get a £2 airtime discount that will remain for as long as they retain their paid Extra). Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Charges applied to O2 bill & are subject to change. If you leave your Ultimate Plan within 6 months of redeeming your Ultimate inclusive Extra, you will need to pay for this Extra at the then-current partner price for the remainder of the initial 6 month period that applies. After that period expires, you will be able to cancel this Extra.


Eligibility & redemption: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select your Extra at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting Extra. You may not be eligible to select Partner if you hold an existing account with Partner. Must set up Partner account & agree to their terms of use.


Disney+: cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Eligibility: must purchase new eligible tariff direct from O2. Select Disney+ at any time after making a qualifying purchase & redeem within 28 days of selecting it. Must set up Disney+ account & agree to its terms of use. Cannot benefit from more than one Extra Period. Unless otherwise communicated to you, redeeming Disney+ through O2 will not automatically cancel or suspend any Disney+ subscription offered directly by Disney or through another third party. It’s your responsibility to manage direct or third party subscriptions. Disney+ content & related artwork © 2024 Disney & related entities.


Tariff eligibility criteria applies which includes being a UK resident, 18+. For how to claim & full terms, see O2 Extras | Terms and Conditions | O2.

promos.cmsDescription:
Data allowances must be used within the month and cannot be carried over. Ends 04 June 2025.

 

O2 Refresh custom plans: Direct purchases only. Pay the cash price for your device or spread the cost over 3 to 36 months (excludes dongles). The device cost will be the same whatever you choose. UK data only. Fair Usage policy applies. Devices are subject to availability. 0% APR. Finance subject to status and credit checks. 18+. Direct Debit. promos.title: Roam at no extra cost in 75 destinations, USA included.
promos.cmsDescription:
Excludes 30-day sim only and mobile broadband tariffs. Roaming destinations include our Europe Zone plus O2 Travel Inclusive in 27 international destinations. Data speed capped at 2 mbps. See https://www.o2.co.uk/international/travel-inclusive-zone.

O2 Travel Inclusive offer only available on eligible tariffs and includes unlimited minutes and texts and data roaming (with capped data speeds of 2 mbps) in 27 selected destinations only (our Inclusive Zone), subject to fair usage at no extra charge.
